```{r setup, include=FALSE}
library(readxl)
library(tidyverse)
source("00-paths.R")
```

```{r}
# Load in our data, which includes full taxonomy
taxa <- read.csv(file.path(paths$newdrake, "2021-02-15_tcga_exora-with-taxonomy.csv"))

```

```{r}
# Select for needed columns
sample_taxa <- taxa %>%
# filter(grepl("d__Bacteria", domain)) %>%
  # We are not interested in the adundance at this point, so this information is removed
  select(-exo.ra, -sample.microbe)
```

```{r}
# Remove duplicate rows
sample_taxa <- unique(sample_taxa)
```

```{r}

# Save
write.csv(sample_taxa,"../data/sample_taxa.csv", row.names = F)

```
